title: Combining 2 $25 RP cards to make a 50 purchase
body: I received two 25 dollar RP cards, is it possible to combine them to make a 50$ purchase, to get the bonus RP?

replies.body:
There's no Bonus RP promotion going on right now, but if there were, I don't believe you'd be able to combine two $25 cards for a bonus.

Let me know if you have any questions.
